QuestData.Title: Welcome to Gorgrond
QuestData.Description: Gorgrond is one of the most untamed landscapes in all of Draenor.$b$bOnly the most skilled of rangari venture this deep into the wilds.$b$bIt is their camp we are heading for. If you wish to travel ahead, it can be found down this path and to the right.$b$bMaraad and I shall follow after you momentarily. We still have some logistics to work out before we leave the landing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the Wildwood Wash to Naielle's Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: You have chosen a very unfortunate time to visit our camp, my friend.
